input: Gregory, o' my word, we'll not carry coals.
response: I mean, an we be in choler, we'll draw.

input: I mean, an we be in choler, we'll draw.
response: I strike quickly, being moved.

input: I strike quickly, being moved.
response: A dog of the house of Montague moves me.

input: A dog of the house of Montague moves me.
response: A dog of that house shall move me to stand: I will

input: A dog of that house shall move me to stand: I will
response: take the wall of any man or maid of Montague's.

input: take the wall of any man or maid of Montague's.
response: True; and therefore women, being the weaker vessels,

input: True; and therefore women, being the weaker vessels,
response: are ever thrust to the wall: therefore I will push

response: Montague's men from the wall, and thrust his maids

response: to the wall.

response: 'Tis all one, I will show myself a tyrant: when I

response: have fought with the men, I will be cruel with the

response: maids, and cut off their heads.

response: Ay, the heads of the maids, or their maidenheads;

input: Ay, the heads of the maids, or their maidenheads;
response: take it in what sense thou wilt.

input: take it in what sense thou wilt.
response: Me they shall feel while I am able to stand: and

response: 'tis known I am a pretty piece of flesh.

response: My naked weapon is out: quarrel, I will back thee.

input: My naked weapon is out: quarrel, I will back thee.
response: Fear me not.

input: Fear me not.
response: Let us take the law of our sides; let them begin.

input: Let us take the law of our sides; let them begin.
response: Nay, as they dare. I will bite my thumb at them;

input: Nay, as they dare. I will bite my thumb at them;
response: which is a disgrace to them, if they bear it.

response: Enter ABRAHAM and BALTHASAR

response: I do bite my thumb, sir.

input: I do bite my thumb, sir.
response: [Aside to GREGORY] Is the law of our side, if I say

response: ay?

response: No, sir, I do not bite my thumb at you, sir, but I

input: No, sir, I do not bite my thumb at you, sir, but I
response: bite my thumb, sir.

response: If you do, sir, I am for you: I serve as good a man as you.

response: Well, sir.

input: Well, sir.
response: Yes, better, sir.
